content: I don't know about others, but when people thank mne for my service, i get a bit unconfortable. it is not that i don't appreciate the gesture, it is just that i NEVER expected anyone to thank me for what I THINK everybody should do. i see the fruit of my service, and the fruit of everyone who has ever served in militarr, civilian, or parrochial service everywhere i go. when we argue, fight amongst eachother, i see the fruit of what we, and so many more fought to protect. THAT, is thanks enough for me...
reply: I don't know about others, but when people thank mne for my service, i get a bit unconfortable. it is not that i don't appreciate the gesture, it is just that i NEVER expected anyone to thank me for what I THINK everybody should do. i see the fruit of my service, and the fruit of everyone who has ever served in militarr, civilian, or parrochial service everywhere i go. when we argue, fight amongst eachother, i see the fruit of what we, and so many more fought to protect. content: ---- When the news came out about clinton actually writing a letter to his draft board saying, Quote, "I LOATH THE MILITARY", I bought (4) rounds in a row for the crowd at my V.F.W. post here in Mich. - AND I told them why... --- You can also thank a Vet by saying, Thanks for NOT being a draft-dodger and forcing some other poor kid to take your place to be killed or wounded.-- That`s all..
reply: ---- When the news came out about clinton actually writing a letter to his draft board saying, Quote, "I LOATH THE MILITARY", I bought (4) rounds in a row for the crowd at my V.F.W. post here in Mich. - AND I told them why... --- You can also thank a Vet by saying, Thanks for NOT being a draft-dodger and forcing some other poor kid to take your place to be killed or wounded.-- That`s all..
